title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6035.5 - Authority of program staff
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6035.5 - Authority of program staff

State Regulations
(a) Program staff shall provide support
services to the council and shall be responsible for the day-to-day
administration of the program. (b) The council retains the authority to make final decisions in all matters that
impact on a law enforcement agency's status in the program. Program staff
shall, however, have the authority to make tentative decisions on behalf of the
council. Illustrative of these matters are the following: (1)
law enforcement agency
eligibility; (2)
identification of
applicable standards; (3)
interpretation of the standards; and
(4)
waiver of applicable standards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6035.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
